titleStmt.title: The word of the Lord to all children born again of the immortal seed as the salutation of the bowels of the unlimitted love of the father, flowing forth to you in the forcible power of his own life / thorow your brother and companion in tribulation and kingdom of patience in the Lord Jesus Christ William Dewsbury.
titleStmt.author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
